page.title: 03CARING FOR THE COMMUNITY.
page.content: Our area{Warndon }consists of large housing estates.The appearance of parts of these{estates }is in places quite disgusting.Some of the houses are not kept in good shape,people do not care.The lawns have{litter}on them and walls are covered with{graffiti.} In our community we do not have much noise except for a few streets near the local youth centre.A lot of the {community respect}their streets and try to keep them tidy.Some people dont care about our pavements.They let their dogs go to toilet on pavements instead of making them use the gutter.Our{community}could change if people tried to stop throwing down {litter}and stopped writing{graffiti over the public walls.If people did take more care,Warndon and Worcester would be a more attractive place to live.
